1: וְהֶחֱזִיקוּ֩ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>shall take hold</n> שֶׁ֨בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> נָשִׁ֜ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>women</n> בְּאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אֶחָ֗ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>of one</n> בַּיּ֤וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And in that day</n> הַהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> לַחְמֵ֣נוּ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>our own bread</n> נֹאכֵ֔ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>We will eat</n> וְשִׂמְלָתֵ֖נוּ <sup>8071 </sup> <n>our own apparel</n> נִלְבָּ֑שׁ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>and wear</n> רַ֗ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>let</n> יִקָּרֵ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>only let us be called</n> שִׁמְךָ֙ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by thy name</n> עָלֵ֔ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֱסֹ֖ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>to take away</n> חֶרְפָּתֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>our reproach</n> ס
2: בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִֽהְיֶה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> צֶ֣מַח <sup>6780 </sup> <n>shall the branch</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לִצְבִ֖י <sup>6643 </sup> <n>be beautiful</n> וּלְכָב֑וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>and glorious</n> וּפְרִ֤י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>and the fruit</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> לְגָא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>[shall be] excellent</n> וּלְתִפְאֶ֔רֶת <sup>8597 </sup> <n>and comely for</n> לִפְלֵיטַ֖ת <sup>6413 </sup> <n>them that are escaped</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
3: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> הַנִּשְׁאָ֣ר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass [that he that is] left</n> בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>in Zion</n> וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <sup>3498 </sup> <n>and [he that] remaineth</n> בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n> קָד֖וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>holy</n> יֵאָ֣מֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>shall be called</n> ל֑וֹ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>who</n> הַכָּת֥וּב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>[even] every one that is written</n> לַחַיִּ֖ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>among the living</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n>
4: אִ֣ם ׀ <sup>518 </sup> <n>When</n> רָחַ֣ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>shall have washed away</n> אֲדֹנָ֗י <sup>136 </sup> <n>When the Lord</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> צֹאַ֣ת <sup>6675 </sup> <n>the filth</n> בְּנוֹת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughters</n> צִיּ֔וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּמֵ֥י <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> יָדִ֣יחַ <sup>1740 </sup> <n>and shall have purged</n> מִקִּרְבָּ֑הּ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>from the midst</n> בְּר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>thereof by the spirit</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>of judgment</n> וּבְר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and by the spirit</n> בָּעֵֽר׃ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>of burning</n>
5: וּבָרָ֣א <sup>1254 </sup> <n>will create</n> יְהוָ֡ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> עַל֩ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> מְכ֨וֹן <sup>4349 </sup> <n>upon every dwelling place</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of mount</n> צִיּ֜וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and over</n> מִקְרָאֶ֗הָ <sup>4744 </sup> <n>and upon her assemblies</n> עָנָ֤ן ׀ <sup>6051 </sup> <n>a cloud</n> יוֹמָם֙ <sup>3119 </sup> <n>by day</n> וְעָשָׁ֔ן <sup>6227 </sup> <n>and smoke</n> וְנֹ֛גַהּ <sup>5051 </sup> <n>and the shining</n> אֵ֥שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>fire</n> לֶהָבָ֖ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>of a flaming</n> לָ֑יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>by night</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> כָּב֖וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>for upon all the glory</n> חֻפָּֽה׃ <sup>2646 </sup> <n>[shall be] a defence</n>
6: וְסֻכָּ֛ה <sup>5521 </sup> <n>And there shall be a tabernacle</n> תִּהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְצֵל־ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>for a shadow</n> יוֹמָ֖ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>in the daytime</n> מֵחֹ֑רֶב <sup>2721 </sup> <n>from the heat</n> וּלְמַחְסֶה֙ <sup>4268 </sup> <n>and for a place of refuge</n> וּלְמִסְתּ֔וֹר <sup>4563 </sup> <n>and for a covert</n> מִזֶּ֖רֶם <sup>2230 </sup> <n>from storm</n> וּמִמָּטָֽר׃ <sup>4306 </sup> <n>and from rain</n> פ
